review: I downloaded this app right after i had a panic attack and a friend told me about it. so far itâ€™s helped a lot when i have my panic attacks . when my panic attacks start or i feel as if iâ€™m going to have one i hit the rootr button and it gives me two options , help me feel okay and letâ€™s do this which are very helpful because if i just need a little bit of assistance with my panic attack i can hit the letâ€™s do this button then it still gives you help and walks you through a little bit but it is a lot faster then if you hit the â€œhelp me feel okay â€œ button it says a lot of different things that help make you feel okay. and you can even tap the screen to have them read aloud to you. and it keeps going and asks you if you feel the panic had ended and if you hit the no button then it keeps going through things but if you hit the yes button then itâ€™s over with . overall i gave rootd a 5/5 stars because of how helpful it is .

title: extremely helpful!

review: I have never written a review for any app before, but I had to for this one if it means possibly helping someone. There are two options for when you need help, which adjusts to your mood, depending if you want to be comforted or if you feel like fighting your anxiety that day. title: Love and best app for anxiety

review:
i really like this app. i mean REALLY like this app. i wish we could give half stars because it would be a 4.5 star rating. the only thing that keeps me giving a 5 star rating is that the education or techniques are seemingly limited and donâ€™t renew themselves. 

i tried the premium version on a week trial base. i even found myself wishing for more techniques and education to be available because i had gone through a great deal of it. i couldnâ€™t help but wonder whether i would eventually get bored with this app and forget that it existed or move onto to something else that seemed to better meet my need for a little more variety and choices. 

that aside, i do enjoy this app and find it helpful and the graphics are adorable. great job rootd.
title: Thank You Rootd

review: Aa I assume whoever is reading this is doing right now, I downloaded Rootd (along with several several other anxiety relief apps) in the midst of a panic attack and I'm really glad I did. I had been going to therapy but it wasn't really helping me understand how to deal with panic attacks when they're actually happening, and I would often just cry it out. Thankfully, this made my attacks much shorter, it's so user friendly and I really appreciate the affirmations it comes with in the SOS feature... while most apps just have a breathing graphic, I feel like I personally need affirmations during attacks and this is perfect for that.

title: hidden gem

title: Grounding

review: This app was recommended to me and it's been an amazing tool for me to use during my panic attacks. It checks in on you daily. there's also a section for journaling where you can input a variety of moods and emotions you may be experiencing. I also find the sleepr section useful for my mild insomnia, it definitely helps you relax. There's a section for lessons that help you to understand what is going on with your body. It's informative and keeps track of your progress. I ve been using it for 2 weeks now and it's extremely helpful.

title: Excellent Tool

review: I have been diagnosed with panic disorder and have been struggling with finding different tools to help cope during these panic attacks. Obviously seeking medical help was step one, and getting into therapy was step two. However this app was able to really illustrate what anxiety is, where it comes from, why itâ€™s happening, and how you can control it. The app uses cognitive based therapy techniques which is what you would be doing in therapy so itâ€™s an excellent extension. I highly recommend this app for anyone struggling with panic attacks or anxiety.

review: I would give this 5 stars however I have two problems 1. For the lessons I understand that you need to have money but what if you made it so you had to watch a ad 2. During the panic attack button it said you donâ€™t experience panic attacks 24/7 but what if you do like me for instance Iâ€™m younger and yet I still have panic attacks almost always
developerResponse:
{'id': 22669427, 'body': 'Hi and thanks so much for your review! Happy to address the points below :) 
1) the understanding lessons in Rootd are completely free and will stay that way. They help you understand whatâ€™s going on during a panic attack and provide the tools you need to manage them. The only paid lesson content is the short and long term lessons, and they are for when youâ€™re ready to use Rootd to manage panic attacks and anxiety for the long term. Creating and maintaining an app is quite expensive and the proceeds help us make sure the app continues to be great! 
2) when we say panic attacks donâ€™t last 24/7, we mean a single panic attack cannot last 24/7. It ebbs and flows as our body finds its way back to calm. Please ask your physician about the details, as hearing from a medical professional is important. We know panic attacks personally and can sympathize. So sorry you had that experience :(  
Please send us an email at support@rootd.io to discuss further as we love to hear from users. Big hugs! ', 'modified': '2021-05-07T03:56:31Z'}

title: Very nice app Nice quality

review:
I can only speak on my experiences, so I love this app! The content of this app, it has helped me through a very stressful and anxious week. For some reason this week alone Iâ€™ve had daily panic attacks, but this app has helped tremendously with relief. I love the factual information they send you with the panic button. I canâ€™t recall what I already know when Iâ€™m in a panic state; I lose all sense of reasoning and fact finding, so reading the information in this app helps a lot with returning to a coherent calm state, and reminding me of what I already know about panic attacks. 

My favorite part is Rootdâ€™s push to help you overcome and understand your anxiety issues from a root cause level, rather than just a quick fix. When on the purchased version they provide tools to help you investigate and resolve your root issues. This helped me identify several causes of my panic attacks from this week, and I see some long term patterns that have been toxic in my life. I am starting to build confidence and feel in control again! 

So now the reason for 4 stars instead of 5:

I ran into a snag with the purchase. I bought this on my laptop, and the directions said to open up the app on my mobile and restore purchase. It didnâ€™t work. I tried multiple times across multiple days. After three days of no success I contacted support through the website contact form. No response, ever. I finally found the email to contact the company directly through my emailed receipt. Once I got in touch, they validated my purchase and unlocked the premium content on my account. Phew! 
BTW, they are very friendly and helpful, they just need to fix their website. Thanks Rootd!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 21079378, 'body': "Hi there Yermel,\n\nWe're so happy you found Rootd! Please do email us at team@rootd.io so that we can figure out what happened with that contact form email. We have not been able to find it but other emails from the form are going through. It means a lot to us as we are working very hard to provide a 5 star experience for our users. ", 'modified': '2021-02-16T05:36:26Z'}
